Class TouchHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dhbw_loerrach.pvbvp.gui.TouchHandler

  • public class TouchHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Renat on 05.04.2017. This class handles the user input

    • Field Summary

      Horizontal Fence, splits the screen though half horizontally.

      Vertical Fence, splits the screen through half vertically.

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void action_remote(float x, android.view.MotionEvent me)
      touch handling for remote games, y doesn't matter since only one player is on the device you are always player 0 on your device
      static void action(float x, float y, android.view.MotionEvent me)
      Will be called when the screen is touched / swiped at x, y for local players
      static void client_action(float x, char updown)
      only called by the server, simulates the input of the client

    • Field Detail

      • TAG

        private static final java.lang.String TAG
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VER_FENCE

        private static int VER_FENCE
        Vertical Fence, splits the screen through half vertically. Any touch smaller than VER_FENCE is accounted to player 1, any touch larger to player 2.

      • HOR_FENCE

        private static int HOR_FENCE
        Horizontal Fence, splits the screen though half horizontally. Any touch smaller than HOR_FENCE is accounted the left, any touch larger to the right side.

      • gameController

        private static GameController gameController

      • playerPanelThread

        private static boolean[] playerPanelThread

                          android.view.MotionEvent me)
        Will be called when the screen is touched / swiped at x, y for local players
        Parameters:
        x - Coordinate in pixel
        y - Coordinate in pixel

                                 android.view.MotionEvent me)
